meanings.definition: The Jewish day of rest and seventh day of the week, observed from Friday evening to Saturday evening.
meanings.sent1: On shabbat, Jewish people rest and spend time with family.
meanings.sent2: We celebrate shabbat every week as a day of rest.
meanings.sent3: During shabbat, the whole family enjoys a break from daily routines.
meanings.sent4: The tranquility of shabbat envelops the household like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful atmosphere of shabbat is a welcome respite from the busy week.

meanings.definition: To observe the Jewish day of rest and refrain from work or other activities.
meanings.sent1: We shabbat every Friday evening to honor the tradition.
meanings.sent2: Remember to shabbat and take a break from work.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally shabbated during the weekend, forgetting about my chores.
meanings.sent4: She decided to shabbat from social media for a day.
meanings.sent5: Shabbating allows us to recharge and reflect on the week ahead.
